Package CZ2002_assignment

Class MenuItemMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • CZ2002_assignment.MenuItemMgr
  • public class MenuItemMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    To manage a list of menuItems allows addition, updates, and deletion of menuItems
    Since:
    2021-06-11
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Kevin Patrick Santoso and Lee Sek heng

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MenuItemMgr()
      Constructor for a MenuItemMgr object when constructor is called, menuItemList will copy the ArrayList returned from MenuItemFactory

      • createMenuItem

        public void createMenuItem​(int priceInCents,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String type)
                    throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        adds a menu item to the menu item list
        Parameters:
        priceInCents - This menuItem's priceInCents
        description - This menuItem's description
        name - This menuItem's name
        type - This menuItem's type
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - when @param priceInCents is not in
        AritmeticException - when @param PriceInCents is negative
